thoughts: I failed to follow my own policy analysis. The tool descriptions explicitly tell me to 'Always start your process with this tool' for sequentialthinking, but I didn't use it when analyzing why sequentialthinking wasn't being used. This is a meta-failure - I should have modeled the behavior I was analyzing. The policy enforcement was right in the tool descriptions I was using, but I didn't follow them.
